item.title: Homenaje a los milongueros -- the show
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description:
Marisa Galindo was directing a show in honor of the milongueros, and she is now posting footage from this show on youtube for all of us to see! The show was filmed on the 16th of October 1991, Homenaje a los Milongueros de Buenos Aires.

I have seen fragments of this show before, but didn’t know the source, and this seems to be much better quality and I think complete. Truth to be told, I haven’t had  time to watch it all yet, but I will, and I will watch it again. And again. And so should you, haha!

httpv://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ph6XGNTea9c

httpv://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YVnLoZj9VzI

httpv://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ktdMg_Mzs0w

httpv://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PbECyyIEzIg

HT: Janis
